revised_title: Analytic Completion in Field Theory and the Edge of the Wedge Theorem
tldr: The authors develop a technique of analytic completion in field theory, providing a simple proof of the edge of the wedge theorem. They also derive an integral representation for the double commutator and apply the technique to the fourfold function. The study focuses on the properties of Wightman functions and the envelope of holomorphy in the theory of quantized fields.
